dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark Infringement Notice]
dmca.body:
t

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Sent: Friday, April 21, 2006 6:30 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark Infringement Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Trademark Infringement Notice
Date:         Thu, 20 Apr 2006 15:40:43 -0400
From:         Sarah Miller <sfm@hkw-law.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         Peter Schoenthaler <PFS@hkw-law.com>



Greetings:

    Please review the attached letter in regard to www.babes.tl
<http://www.babes.tl>,  a website hosted on your servers that is
infringing upon our clients trademark rights. The attachment is in Adobe
pdf. format. Please respond by April 27, 2006. Thank you.

*/Sarah F. Miller/*
HILL, KERTSCHER & WHARTON, LLP
3350 Riverwood Parkway, Suite 800
Atlanta, GA 30339
Ph: 770-953-0995 Ext. 118
Fax: 770-953-1358


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFESMJOvK/XpJs6oyURAnzkAJ0fnN8Z1DBxWGm7qFM3m0TzILa5UQCfexIp
79K8FUz8AES/XU7c5o6cjfs=
=X5sQ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
